Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityLow: Hey, @. So I stopped by Pierre's the other day and bought {1} {2}. He said you sold it to him. #$b#It’s nice to be able to support both you and Pierre. Plus, I cooked it up for dinner last night, and it was pretty good!
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityHigh: Hey, @. So I stopped by Pierre's the other day and bought {1} {2}. He said you sold it to him. #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit!$h#$b#Well done! I can’t wait to see what else you sell him!
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityLow: Hi...you sold {1} {2} to the general store the other day, right? I bought it...#$e#It’s nice to have such fresh options to pick from.
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. I'm impressed.
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityLow_Rude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# Can't miss out on a sale.
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityHigh_Rude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# It was actually pretty {4}. Good job, farmer.
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_NonRude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# I couldn't pass up that great price. Seems like Pierre really wants to support you and farm! I’ll keep an eye out for more from you!
Entries.PurchasedItem_4: So I was at the store the other day and Pierre showed me {1} {2} you brought in.#$e#I bought it.$h
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_VegetableOrFruit: I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. #$b#He said that you grew the thing on your own farm. I didn't know you were such a talented farmer!$h#$b#It must be exciting to have your produce in stores, huh? Great job, @!
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_Cooking: I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. #$b#He said you cooked the thing yourself using local ingredients. I didn't know you were such {3} {4} chef!
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_Foraged: I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. He said you found it yourself. I didn't know you were such a talented forager!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Teen: I picked up {2} at the store last night. My mom wanted something good for dinner.
Entries.PurchasedItem_Abigail_QualityLow: Hey. We had one of those {2} you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out.$h#$b#It was still alright.
Entries.PurchasedItem_Abigail_QualityHigh: Hey. We had one of those {2} you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out.$h#$b#It was still pretty good, though.
Entries.PurchasedItem_Caroline_QualityLow: Oh, @... This is embarrassing. I threw one of the {2}s you sold us into my compost bin.$s#$b#But on the bright side, the worms are loving it! You can’t beat local for quality!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Caroline_QualityHigh: Oh, @... This is so embarrassing. I threw one of the {2}s you sold us into my compost bin.$s#$b#But on the bright side, the worms are really loving it! They've never looked happier!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Pierre_QualityLow: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.#$b#It’s so convenient to have a local source for those kinds of things.$h#$b#Well... back to business, huh?
Entries.PurchasedItem_Pierre_QualityHigh: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.#$b#My wife loved it! ...And Abby even started going to town on it after I smothered the thing in hoisin sauce. $h#$b#Well... back to business, huh?
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh_Jodi: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. As soon as I smelled it I was back in Granny's old cottage...
Entries.PurchasedItem_Haley: Emily tried to serve me {1} {2} for dinner last night... It was alright, I guess.
Entries.PurchasedItem_Elliott: I saw that Pierre had fresh {2} in the shop the other day! Marvelous. It smelled just perfect... And it was quite firm, too!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Alex: Hey, so I picked up {1} {2} at the store last night. Grandma made a delicious casserole.$h
Entries.PurchasedItem_Leah: The other day I bought {1} {2} at Pierre's. It was perfect on a bed of greens with a dash of my homemade vinaigrette.

I'm impressed!#$e# Anyways...
